articles.description: Asus has announced the 16-inch Flow X16, a 2-in-1 convertible gaming laptop that features a 16:10 aspect ratio QHD Mini LED display, and can sport up to AMD’s Ryzen 9 6900HS, and Nvidia’s RTX 3070 Ti.
articles.content:
The Flow series finally gets a contender that can do serious gaming by itself
The new X16 can sport a Mini LED display with 512 dimming zones.
Image: Asus

articles.title: Sonos responds to Sub Mini: "there's a lot of products we consider" - TechRadar
articles.description: Sonos Sub Mini: what to expect from the budget subwoofer to partner the Ray
